title: What is the "profile level"?
body: Is it bundled with summoner level?

replies.body: Yeah, your boards profile  just has to sync with your account when posting for the first time.  As you gain levels on your account, it should also match to your boards profile.  :D  Just keep in mind that a lot of areas of the boards have at least a level 5 posting requirement, so you'll want to get some more games in!  I hope that helps!
